nodes.text: The CC-V 'Legion' Cryo Projector was a weapon that used a liquid cryo substance to cause severe freeze damage in targets. It was especially effective against heavily armored infantry units.
The weapon was developed by the Ulban Corporation with the help of some of the most renowned commandos in the galaxy.

The CC-V 'Legion' Cryo Projector is a weapon in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Schematics for this weapon can be looted in the Lost Star Destroyer and IG-88 Heroic Encounters and can be manufactured by players of the munitions trader profession.
